TopicTitle: (0.23) Wayland Corp. Development and released download Thread (new parts)

Articles.Content:
@Devo

If your game Devo any chance I could get you to model some animated landing legs?

Just playing around with the hyper ring and though hmmm...

I'm looking for legs similar in principle to Bobcat's Home lander legs that spin out, however I'm after some that will sit above a first stage rocket motor, spin out and down and long enough to clear the engines cowling to the ground, and at a wide enough angle to give good support.

Would be a very very useful part I think.

Soon, I am working on these, they are pretty much done. These are part of the MSI Animator pack.

These wont give enough clearance for an engine but I am making a set that will.

Edited July 14, 2013 by Devo

My God that is sexy Devo, you guys are really going to town on these great additions. Man I am so excited about the carriage gantry systems. I just left a post on Sirkuts thread asking approximately when we can see it released. I am assuming you guys are going to release some kind of a new package that is going to revamp the robotics/servos area. I know you understand how important these are to the community, and it is great to see you guys taking so much time to make it happen. As far as the carriage gantry system, hopefully you guys will make at least 3 sizes of powered carriages, with 6-8 lengths of railing. From their we can modify our personal cfg's for more sizes.

Thx man, great work as always. Wish I had an understanding of the software so I could help out.... but I am clueless

Dren
Lol nice legs devo!

Awww.....was feelin all good about my indylegs and then you post these!

Heh, Im just messin =P

Those look awesome!! Once again its a perfect blend of realism, sci-fi, and functionality.

If I had even 1/100th the skill you and sirkut have for making things...haha Id be doin ok.
Devo has all the modelling/artwork skills. I'm just a coding & idea punk. Devo constantly surprises me with his style.

@devo

Ya basically some that will extend long enough to clear most first stage rocket motor clusters, or be upscaled to do so.

Other ideas for ya.

A Rocket motor cluster model, where the engines retract and are closed over by a heat shield for re-entry, combined with a set of those leg would just look freakishly awesome.

Or indeed 2 one with Planetery Lox engines and one with Ion Engines you can swap out in orbit, the planetary engines retract and the Space engines deploy if you will.

And Docking superstructure.

A part that can extend a animated truss towards the identical part opposite it, seek each other out clamp and form a solid truss between the two, for all your wobbly station and docking nightmares.

So you can create stations etc that are more rigid and don't have struts etc all over the place

Edited July 15, 2013 by Hawkstorm
Hey Devo, when will we be seeing the return of the Pegasus Shuttle for .20.X

DEVO This is the upper stage of a station im working on. The bottom half will take some time to complete.

Sirkut ive been replacing all the DR rotation with your nice and flat ones. They work really good, for more than just docking

http://i.imgur.com/BQ1hnEI.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/Epu6ZxX.jpg

Notice the crane on the back? I use them for everything now

http://i.imgur.com/jEbhWS3.jpg

This i when i started experimenting with your mods for the small crane. After this i replaced the DR (on the Track Drives for steering) with yours. When you complete the slider mod, im going to try and use them for the lifters

You can see the difference between this pic and the first few

http://i.imgur.com/PoSSi0G.jpg

Edited July 15, 2013 by viperwolf

DEVO This is the upper stage of a station im working on. The bottom half will take some time to complete.

WOW..that's a BEAST!!

Glad to see someone else enjoying the hyper ring as much as me =) I don't have pics yet, but that ring will be in all of my orbital stations, transit ships, and a fair number of my industrial landers.

Oh ya having some fun with the Hyper ring proc wings and B9 Mod.

Can make a entire modular system around it, fly's well too.

Well that's when I'm not running into the hello world bug.

Edited July 15, 2013 by Hawkstorm

@Viperwolf haahaha .. that's awesome, I love when people do more creative things than I can think of doing with my own stuff Can't wait to see the maiden voyage!

@Hawkstorm, you mentioned an engine that retracts and has a heatshield and gives clearance?

Let me see what I've got in my toolbox..

ehr. Mah. Gehrd. Me wantz.

Great parts. The "hyper ring" part especially makes a great core for a low-lag fuel depot or interplanetary tug. (Also, can't wait for the mech-legs)

Not sure if it's just me, but I'm getting a "this video does not exist" error on the YouTube video in that post. Just pointing that out for Devogen, hopefully he can rectify that minor snafu.

EDIT - apparently there's only an issue on the quoted one, the regular one works just fine... strange.

here is the original link

Let me see what I've got in my toolbox..

Hmmm, now what can I say to that....

ME WANT!!!!

Pretty Please :)

couple new parts coming in the next day or so..

I will release this little pack, it stands ok on it's own so might as well, comes in handy as a nice escape pod, note the absurdly large viewing porthole, and yes there is a custom IVA already done for it.

All open

pre-deployment..
Jeez man, your pumping out some mods. Good work as always. I was working on escape pods today for my station. now these will work wonderful for that.

ooh, fun. looks like a replacement to the egg. always liked the egg. but this looks even better.

Does it play work with deadly re-entry?

ooh, fun. looks like a replacement to the egg. always liked the egg. but this looks even better.

Does it play work with deadly re-entry?

I haven't tested it yet, but I can't see why not. I also added a heat shield to the top of the parachute canopy, just incase you come in head first.
Epic Devo. Pure epic ness.

This stuff just gets cooler and cooler... If I could ask, could you make a desert sand colored HMMWV Vehicle? You don't have any reason to do this request, and you probably want to do other things, but it would mean a lot to me and maybe even a few other people if you made a Humvee.

http://armytrucksinc.homestead.com/Inventory_Images/HMMWV_Jeeps/usmc_hmv.gif

Thanks.

This stuff just gets cooler and cooler... If I could ask, could you make a desert sand colored HMMWV Vehicle? You don't have any reason to do this request, and you probably want to do other things, but it would mean a lot to me and maybe even a few other people if you made a Humvee.

http://armytrucksinc.homestead.com/Inventory_Images/HMMWV_Jeeps/usmc_hmv.gif

Thanks.

Would you settle for a cross between a Halo warthog and a humvee? I sort of already have made one, it has camouflage texture also, but sand/dirt would be no problem.

Would you settle for a cross between a Halo warthog and a humvee? I sort of already have made one, it has camouflage texture also, but sand/dirt would be no problem.

I vote YES!

Yes!

I actually had an issue where the forklifts were playing havoc with the animations so I had them set, but in the past couple of weeks as you know me and Sirkut have been working on the new Infernal Robotics, of which he has developed a new system to allow me to do just that, control the animations exactly as you said.

Now that this is possible, and I can also make working wheels, I am making a dedicated forklift and forklift body ( 1 seater) The body will some small torque but alot of weight to counterbalance the load you carry.

It will have lift, tilt - everything basically - and it will all be contained in 1 part (except wheels, which I like to keep seperate to allow people to change the types)

Hey Devo, just curious, you still working on this? Im really interested in a new forklift.
